body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places               Places         From the edge of the Palouse, at an overlook on Highway 95, you can see the wide expanse of the Nez Perce homeland. The towns in the distance are Lewiston, Idaho and Clarkston, Washington. NPS Photo  The Nez Perce have a special relationship with the lands they call home. Nez Perce National Historical Park, along with its Tribal partners, work to preserve these special and sacred places and honor the stories that are associated with them.  Clicking on the links above will take you to pages devoted to the various themes and sites related to Nez Perce National Historical Park. To view a comprehensive list of the park's 38 sites, please click here.
